## STBLStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an STBL Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type STBLStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeSTBL: T;
    unstakeSTBL?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeSTBL?: undefined;
    unstakeSTBL: T;
    unstakeAllSTBL: boolean;
};
```
